programme.title: Accomplice to Murder, With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: TN v. Turner: The Deadly Game
programme.desc: The murder of hometown NBA player, Lorenzen Wright remains unsolved until alleged accomplice Jimmy Martin reveals the location of the murder weapon, implicating Wright's ex-wife Sherra and her yardman Billy Ray Turner.

programme.title: Accomplice to Murder, With Vinnie Politan
programme.sub-title: FL v. Schulhoff: Romeo and Juliet in Central Florida
programme.desc: In a modern-day tale of Romeo and Juliet with a Florida twist, high schoolers Courtney Schulhoff and Michael Morin find solace in each other amidst a tumultuous family life; when their families force them apart the couple's desperation turns deadly.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A triple homicide in small town Maine rocks a community and destroys a family. It doesn't take police long to piece together the elements of the crime, and its ruthless cover-up, which point back to a perpetrator close to home.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A heartbroken millionaire marries a much younger woman, ending with a shotgun blast to the stomach and a lethal dose of poison.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: After a brutal killing at a construction site, homicide detectives track down a suspect who they've been eyeing from the beginning.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A deranged man terrorizes New York City in the late 1970s, leaving a trail of dead and wounded in his wake until a series of letters, a reluctant witness, and a parking ticket lead to his capture.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A seductress bleeds two cops in Georgia dry before killing them for their life insurance benefits.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A wayward son goes across two states on a shooting spree, killing five people before the police identify him as an ex-con who escaped from a halfway home.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: Cops suspect an ex-lover is the culprit when a woman is savagely murdered inside her rural Louisiana home, but after years of investigation, it becomes clear that her deranged neighbors were involved.

programme.title: It Takes a Killer
programme.desc: A merciless triple homicide in New Orleans, Louisiana leaves law enforcement with puzzling clues, but as they piece together the mystery, they quickly realize there is more to the murders than a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Opening Statements With Julie Grant
programme.desc: Former prosecutor Julie Grant is joined by a team of top trial attorneys and forensic experts to cover the high-stakes trials that are on the docket, and the crime cases dominating the headlines.
